SEARCH
Package com.example.haboob

Class AdminUserAdapter.ViewHolder

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
com.example.haboob.AdminUserAdapter.ViewHolder
Enclosing class:
AdminUserAdapter
public static class AdminUserAdapter.ViewHolder extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
ViewHolder class for caching view references within each user card. Improves scrolling performance by avoiding repeated findViewById calls.
